courseDetails.title: 10 Days Of CSS Grid
courseDetails.shortDescription: A course designed to give you the confidence in applying CSS Grid given different design scenarios.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you want to master CSS Grid? Well look no further, in this comprehensive course "10 Days Of CSS Grid" specifically designed to provide you with full confidence in applying CSS Grid given different design scenarios. The course is structured in a way so that we can start by applying the CSS Grid layout model to some basic designs before gradually moving to more complex designs. In terms of the CSS Grid properties that will be explored this course will not necessarily explain the theory behind them but instead show how they can be used across different projects. Below is an overview of the projects we will cover in this course:

Day 1: Form CSS Grid Design

On Day 1, you will explore how the grid-template-columns property can be used so that we can declare two columns of equal widths.

Day 2: Multi Colored Centered Boxes CSS Grid Design

On Day 2, you will learn how we can use the grid-template-columns, justify content, align-content and grid-gap properties to achieve a centralized box design layout with different colors.

Day 3: Timeline CSS Grid Design

On Day 3, you will learn how we can use the grid-template-columns, grid-column-gap, justify-self properties to achieve a timeline based layout.

Day 4: Nested CSS Grid Design

On Day 4, you will learn how we can use properties like grid-template-columns, justify-items and align-items to achieve a nested grid design.

Day 5: Mobile CSS Grid Design

On Day 5, you will learn how we can use properties like grid-template-columns, grid-template-rows, grid-auto-rows, grid-row, align-self, justify-items and align-items to construct a generic mobile design.

Day 6: Keyboard CSS Grid Design

On Day 6, you will learn how we can use properties like grid-template-columns, grid-gap, grid-column, justify-items and align-items to construct a generic keyboard design.

Day 7: Diamond Grid CSS Grid Design

On Day 7, you will learn how to use properties like grid-template-columns, grid-gap and grid-column to create a diamond grid design.

Day 8: Split Image CSS Grid Design

On Day 8, you will learn how to create a split image grid layout using properties such as grid-template-columns, grid-template-rows, grid-gap and grid-column.

Day 9: Responsive Webpage CSS Grid Design

On Day 9, you will learn how to use properties like grid-template-columns, grid-template-rows, grid-column-gap, grid-template-areas, grid-auto-flow, grid-auto-rows, justify-content, align-self, justify-self, justify-items and align-items to create a responsive webpage grid design.

Day 10: Responsive Dropdown Navigation Menu CSS Grid Design

On Day 10, you will learn how to build a responsive navigation dropdown menu using properties like grid-template-columns, grid-template-rows, justify-items, align-items, justify-content, align-content and justify-self.


By the end of the course, you should have a solid understanding in how you can incorporate the CSS Grid layout model into your own website designs. Enroll now and lets master CSS Grid together.
targetAudiences: Anyone looking to feel confident in designing webpages using the CSS Grid layout model.
Anyone looking to see how CSS Grid can be used given different design layouts.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn The Most Effective Machine Learning Techniques in Python
courseDetails.longDescription:

courseDetails.shortDescription: Inside Sales, Sales Discovery, Inclusive Marketing, Sales Funnel, Sales Performance Metrics, Lead Conversion Technology
courseDetails.longDescription:

This course provides a comprehensive overview of inside sales, covering its evolution, team structures, essential tools, and technologies that enhance sales performance. Learners will gain a deep understanding of the sales funnel, customer journey, and the strategies necessary to optimize lead conversion and relationship management.

This course explores proven techniques for conducting impactful discovery meetings, leveraging SPIN Selling methodologies, and handling objections with confidence. By mastering these strategies, participants will enhance their ability to communicate persuasively and drive successful sales outcomes.

Inclusive marketing is essential for businesses aiming to connect authentically with diverse audiences. This course delves into the principles of inclusive marketing, offering actionable strategies to integrate inclusivity into sales processes. Participants will also learn how to measure sales performance using key metrics and adapt to emerging trends, ensuring they stay competitive in an ever-evolving sales landscape.

In this master course, I would like to teach major topics:
Module 1: Introduction to Inside Sales

Module 2: Structuring and Roles in Inside Sales

Module 3: Tools and Technologies for Inside Sales

Module 4: The Sales Funnel and Customer Journey

Module 5: Sales Discovery Strategies

Module 6: Advanced Sales Discovery Techniques

Module 7: Inclusive Marketing in Sales

Module 8: Performance Metrics and Continuous Improvement

Enroll now and learn today !

Entrepreneurship is the process of identifying opportunities, innovating, and taking risks to create and manage a business venture. It involves the willingness to bear uncertainty and the capacity to adapt to changing circumstances in order to achieve success. Entrepreneurs are individuals who embark on this journey, utilizing their creativity, vision, and determination to bring their ideas to life.

There are several main reasons why individuals choose to become entrepreneurs and build their own businesses:

  1. Pursuit of Passion: Many entrepreneurs are driven by a passion for a particular idea, product, or service. They want to bring their vision to fruition and make a meaningful impact in their chosen field.

  2. Financial Independence: Building a successful business can provide financial freedom and independence. Entrepreneurs have the opportunity to create wealth for themselves and their families by capitalizing on their own ideas and hard work.

  3. Flexibility and Autonomy: Entrepreneurship offers the flexibility to set one's own schedule and work on projects that align with personal values and goals. Entrepreneurs have the autonomy to make decisions and shape the direction of their businesses as they see fit.

  4. Desire for Innovation: Entrepreneurship is often driven by a desire to innovate and create something new. Entrepreneurs seek to solve problems, disrupt industries, and introduce novel solutions that improve people's lives.

  5. Personal Growth and Fulfillment: Building a business can be a deeply rewarding experience that fosters personal growth and fulfillment. Entrepreneurs face challenges, overcome obstacles, and learn valuable lessons along the way, which can lead to a sense of accomplishment and fulfillment.

Learning about business can provide essential knowledge and skills that support the process of building a career and launching a startup. Some ways in which learning about business can be beneficial include:

  1. Understanding Market Dynamics: A solid understanding of business principles can help entrepreneurs identify market opportunities, assess demand for their products or services, and develop effective strategies for reaching their target audience.

  2. Financial Management: Learning about finance and accounting is crucial for managing the financial aspects of a business, including budgeting, forecasting, and managing cash flow. This knowledge is essential for making informed decisions and ensuring the financial health of a startup.

  3. Marketing and Sales: Effective marketing and sales strategies are essential for attracting customers and growing a business. Learning about marketing principles, branding, and customer acquisition can help entrepreneurs develop strategies to effectively promote their products or services and drive sales.

  4. Leadership and Management: Learning about leadership and management principles can help entrepreneurs build and lead high-performing teams, delegate tasks effectively, and create a positive work culture within their organizations.

Overall, learning about business can provide entrepreneurs with the knowledge, skills, and confidence they need to navigate the challenges of entrepreneurship, build successful businesses, and achieve their goals.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build their own business or become an entrepreneur

courseDetails.title: Leadership Potholes
courseDetails.shortDescription: Instructor Jim Buchan helps you navigate the dangers, toils, and snares you’ll face as a leader, so you can find success
courseDetails.longDescription:
Why another course on leadership? Haven’t we heard enough on the subject already?


Most leaders have read numerous leadership books and viewed countless seminars and podcasts. But even though they’ve experienced periodic successes, often the unexpected “potholes” on the Leadership Highway keep them from finishing well.


Fortunately, there’s a solution! This course presents time-tested principles to help leaders discover and maintain alignment with their highest calling.


Instructor Jim Buchan gleans from his diverse career path as an attorney, businessman, pastor, and author. Rather than merely rehashing leadership principles gained from other authors and presenters, Jim leans heavily on practical lessons he has learned in the day-to-day trenches of life. His experience as a Bible teacher and Christian minister is also evident in his worldview.


Participants in this course will learn how to prevent burnout…avoid moral failure…maintain their focus…and handle bullies and narcissists. You find the tools you need to regain your sharp leadership “edge”—in your physical, mental, and spiritual life.


Students can download a pdf of Jim’s highly acclaimed book, Walking the Leadership Highway—Without Becoming Roadkill! Jim would also enjoy interacting with you about the personal challenges and successes you’ve experienced as a leader.


This course includes:

- 2 Hours and 49 Minutes of on-demand videos

- Full lifetime access

- Access on mobile or desktop

- Downloadable 175-page leadership ebook

- Certificate of completion
targetAudiences: Leaders who want to become better in their leadership and aspiring leaders who are exploring whether to pursue a leadership role.

courseDetails.title: Reskilling Your Organization Step by Step
courseDetails.shortDescription: Boost Your Workforce with Cutting-Edge Skills: A Step-by-Step Reskilling Strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
In today’s rapidly evolving business landscape, keeping your workforce equipped with the latest skills is essential for staying competitive. This course, Reskilling Your Organization Step by Step, provides a practical guide to identifying skill gaps, designing effective reskilling programs, and ensuring your employees are ready for the future. Whether your organization is navigating the shift to cloud computing, artificial intelligence, or enhanced cybersecurity, this course will give you the tools to build a capable and adaptable team.

You’ll learn how to conduct a comprehensive skills gap analysis, set measurable reskilling goals, and design tailored learning paths based on employee roles and future business needs. The course also covers how to leverage e-learning platforms and blended learning strategies, combining online, in-person, and peer-to-peer learning for maximum impact.

By the end of this course, you will be able to roll out a reskilling program, engage leadership and managers, and monitor employee progress effectively. Additionally, you’ll learn how to measure the success of your initiative and calculate its return on investment (ROI), ensuring your reskilling efforts contribute to long-term business performance.

Designed for HR professionals, business leaders, and team managers, this course will help you future-proof your organization by empowering your workforce with the skills they need to thrive in a constantly changing industry. Start transforming your team today with our step-by-step reskilling approach.
targetAudiences: HR Managers and Leaders: Responsible for talent development and workforce planning.
Business Leaders: Seeking to future-proof their organization by developing in-house talent
Team Managers and Supervisors: Looking to upskill or reskill their teams to meet new challenges.
L&D Professionals: Focused on implementing training and reskilling programs within organizations.

courseDetails.title: Edición de videos con CAPCUT y RESOLVE para principiantes
courseDetails.shortDescription: Transforma tus videos y crea contenido impactante para tu audiencia o clientes .
courseDetails.longDescription:
"¡Aprende a editar como un pro!
Transforma tus videos y crea contenido impactante con nuestro curso de edición en CapCut y DaVinci Resolve. Aprende desde lo básico hasta técnicas avanzadas, dominar efectos, transiciones, colonización (etalonaje) y trucos visuales que harán que tus videos sobresalgan.

Durante el curso, nos adentraremos en los aspectos fundamentales de la edición, comenzando desde cero. Aprenderás a importar y organizar tus clips, aplicar transiciones y efectos especiales, y colorizar tus videos para que luzcan profesionales. También abordaremos la importancia de la música y el sonido, enseñándote a añadir y sincronizar pistas que realcen tus proyectos.

Exploraremos técnicas avanzadas, como la creación de títulos animados, la corrección de color y la optimización de tus videos para plataformas como YouTube e Instagram. Además, cada lección incluye ejemplos prácticos y ejercicios para que puedas aplicar lo aprendido de inmediato.

Al finalizar, estarás equipado con las habilidades necesarias para editar videos que no solo sean atractivos, sino que también cuenten una historia. No importa si quieres crear contenido para redes sociales, hacer proyectos personales o iniciar una carrera en la edición de video; este curso te dará las herramientas para hacerlo.

¡Inscríbete ahora y empieza a crear videos que impacten!

Inscríbete hoy y conviértete en el editor que siempre quisiste ser!"
targetAudiences: Principiantes en edición de video: Personas que desean aprender desde cero y no tienen experiencia previa.
Creadores de contenido: Youtubers, influencers y emprendedores que buscan mejorar la calidad de sus videos para atraer más audiencia
Estudiantes de comunicación y multimedia: Aquellos que quieren complementar su formación con habilidades prácticas de edición.
Profesionales que quieren actualizarse: Editores de video que desean aprender nuevas herramientas y técnicas en CapCut y DaVinci Resolve.
Aficionados a la producción audiovisual: Personas que disfrutan de hacer videos como hobby y quieren llevar sus proyectos al siguiente nivel.

courseDetails.title: Beden Dilinin Şifreleri
courseDetails.shortDescription: Etkili İletişim ve Güçlü Bir İlk İzlenim İçin Beden Dili Sanatı
courseDetails.longDescription:
Beden Dilinin Gücünü Keşfedin: İletişimin Sessiz Ama En Etkili Yönü!


İnsanların sadece size söylediklerine mi dikkat ediyorsunuz, yoksa ne söylediklerinden çok nasıl söylediklerine mi?

Beden dili, iletişimin en güçlü araçlarından biridir ve kelimelerden çok daha fazlasını anlatır. Bir toplantıda, iş görüşmesinde, sunum yaparken ya da sosyal bir ortamda; bedeniniz sizin hakkınızda karşı tarafa sayısız mesaj gönderiyor. Ama bu mesajlar doğru mu? Siz farkında olmadan beden diliniz özgüvensiz, gergin veya mesafeli bir izlenim mi bırakıyor?

Eğer beden dilinizi daha etkili kullanmak, insanları daha iyi anlamak, topluluk önünde daha güçlü bir duruş sergilemek ve iletişim becerilerinizi bir üst seviyeye taşımak istiyorsanız, bu kurs tam size göre!


Bu Kursta Neler Öğreneceksiniz?


  • Beden dilinin temel prensiplerini öğreneceksiniz ve onu bilinçli bir şekilde nasıl kullanacağınızı keşfedeceksiniz.

  • İnsanların duygu ve düşüncelerini kelimelerden bağımsız olarak anlamayı öğreneceksiniz ve onların beden dillerini okuyabileceksiniz.

  • İş görüşmelerinde, toplantılarda ve sunumlarda güçlü bir duruş sergilemenin sırlarını öğreneceksiniz.

  • Kendinize güvenli, etkileyici ve ikna edici bir beden dili geliştireceksiniz.

  • Beden dilinizle nasıl daha sempatik, samimi ve güvenilir görüneceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.

  • Göz teması, jestler, el ve yüz hareketleri gibi en kritik unsurları nasıl yöneteceğinizi keşfedeceksiniz.

  • Beden diliyle yalanı tespit etmenin ipuçlarını öğreneceksiniz.

  • Topluluk önünde konuşurken karşınızdakilere güçlü ve etkileyici bir mesaj vermek için beden dilinizi nasıl kullanacağınızı öğreneceksiniz.

  • İş hayatında ve sosyal çevrenizde daha karizmatik bir etki yaratmayı öğreneceksiniz.

  • Farklı kültürlerde beden dilinin nasıl değiştiğini ve uluslararası iletişimde beden dilinin önemini öğreneceksiniz.

  • Kişisel alanınızı ve başkalarının kişisel alanlarını nasıl doğru yöneteceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.

  • Tokalaşma, oturma pozisyonları, avuç hareketleri gibi detayların insanlar üzerinde nasıl bir etki yarattığını anlayacaksınız.



Kurs Kimler İçin Uygun?


  • İş dünyasında kendini daha iyi ifade etmek isteyen profesyoneller ve yöneticiler

  • Satış ve pazarlama alanında çalışan, ikna becerilerini geliştirmek isteyen kişiler

  • İnsan kaynakları uzmanları ve mülakat süreçlerinde beden dilini analiz etmek isteyenler

  • Topluluk önünde konuşma yapan eğitmenler, konuşmacılar ve akademisyenler

  • Daha özgüvenli görünmek ve ikna edici bir duruş sergilemek isteyen öğrenciler ve yeni mezunlar

  • Sosyal ortamlarda ve günlük hayatta kendini daha iyi ifade etmek isteyen bireyler

  • Avukatlar, hukukçular ve müzakere süreçlerinde avantaj sağlamak isteyenler

  • Eğitimciler ve öğretmenler, sınıfta öğrencileriyle daha etkili bir bağ kurmak isteyenler

  • Oyuncular ve sahne sanatçıları, duygularını beden diliyle daha iyi ifade etmek isteyenler

  • İletişimde ustalaşmak ve beden dilini etkili bir araç olarak kullanmak isteyen herkes!


Neden Böyle Bir Kurs?


  • İnsanların %93'ü iletişimde beden dili ve ses tonunun etkili olduğunu söylüyor. Yani söyledikleriniz kadar nasıl söylediğiniz de önemli!

  • İlk izlenim sadece 7 saniyede oluşuyor! İş görüşmelerinde, toplantılarda ya da yeni insanlarla tanışırken doğru beden diliyle güçlü bir izlenim bırakmanız gerekiyor.

  • Beden dilini yanlış kullanmak, farkında olmadan itici, soğuk ya da güvensiz bir izlenim bırakmanıza neden olabilir. Bu kurs ile bu hataları yapmaktan kaçınacaksınız.

  • Beden dilinizi geliştirdiğinizde, sosyal ve iş hayatınızda çok daha etkili bir insan olabilirsiniz! Kendinizi daha net ifade edebilir, insanlarla daha güçlü bağlantılar kurabilirsiniz.


Bu Kursta Sizi Neler Bekliyor?


  • Gerçek hayattan örnekler, pratik uygulamalar ve analizler ile öğrenme sürecinizi pekiştireceksiniz.

  • Bilimsel araştırmalarla desteklenen, kolay anlaşılır ve uygulanabilir beden dili tekniklerini öğreneceksiniz.

  • Beden dili üzerine uzmanlık kazanmanızı sağlayacak görseller ve interaktif içeriklerle dolu kapsamlı bir eğitim alacaksınız.

  • Hemen uygulamaya koyabileceğiniz tekniklerle, öğrendiklerinizi iş ve sosyal hayatınıza entegre edebileceksiniz.


Bu kurs, "Beden Dilinin Şifrelerini" çözmek ve iletişimde ustalaşmak isteyen herkes için özel olarak hazırlandı!

Siz de beden dilinizi keşfetmek, özgüveninizi artırmak ve iletişim becerilerinizi geliştirmek istiyorsanız, başlayalım!
targetAudiences: İş dünyasında daha etkili iletişim kurmak isteyen profesyoneller – Toplantılarda, sunumlarda ve iş görüşmelerinde kendini daha güçlü ifade etmek isteyen çalışanlar, yöneticiler ve girişimciler.
İnsan kaynakları ve mülakat uzmanları – İşe alım süreçlerinde adayların beden dilini doğru analiz etmek ve daha başarılı mülakatlar gerçekleştirmek isteyen İK profesyonelleri.
Satış ve pazarlama uzmanları – Müşterilerle daha etkili iletişim kurarak ikna becerilerini artırmak ve satışlarını güçlendirmek isteyen satış temsilcileri ve pazarlamacılar.

Topluluk önünde konuşma becerilerini geliştirmek isteyenler – Sunumlar, konferanslar ve eğitimlerde etkili bir beden dili kullanarak daha karizmatik ve güçlü bir konuşmacı olmak isteyen eğitmenler, konuşmacılar ve yöneticiler.
Liderlik becerilerini geliştirmek isteyen yöneticiler ve takım liderleri – Çalışanlarıyla daha güçlü bir bağ kurmak, otoritesini beden diliyle pekiştirmek isteyen liderler ve yöneticiler.
Eğitimciler ve öğretmenler – Sınıf içinde öğrencilerle daha etkili iletişim kurarak anlatımlarını güçlendirmek isteyen öğretmenler, akademisyenler ve özel ders veren eğitmenler.
Psikologlar ve terapistler – Danışanlarının duygu durumlarını daha iyi analiz edebilmek için beden dili okumayı öğrenmek isteyen ruh sağlığı profesyonelleri.
Kariyerine güçlü bir başlangıç yapmak isteyen öğrenciler ve yeni mezunlar – İş görüşmelerinde, stajlarda ve networking etkinliklerinde daha güven veren bir beden diliyle öne çıkmak isteyen gençler.
Daha özgüvenli bir duruş sergilemek isteyen bireyler – Günlük hayatta ve profesyonel ortamlarda kendini daha iyi ifade etmek isteyen kişiler.
Sosyal ortamlarda daha iyi iletişim kurmak isteyenler – Yeni insanlarla tanışırken daha etkili bir beden dili kullanarak güvenilir ve samimi bir izlenim bırakmak isteyenler.
İkna becerilerini geliştirmek isteyen avukatlar ve hukuk profesyonelleri – Duruşmalarda, müzakerelerde ve müvekkilleriyle görüşmelerde daha güçlü bir duruş sergilemek isteyen hukukçular.
Müşteri hizmetleri ve çağrı merkezi çalışanları – Telefonla ya da yüz yüze görüşmelerde beden dilini kullanarak müşteri deneyimini iyileştirmek isteyenler.
Siyasetçiler ve kamu konuşmacıları – Halk önünde konuşmalar yaparken, beden diliyle mesajlarını daha etkili bir şekilde iletmek isteyen siyasi figürler ve kamuoyu liderleri.
Oyuncular ve sahne sanatçıları – Duygularını daha iyi ifade edebilmek ve karakterlerine daha fazla derinlik katmak için beden dilini etkili kullanmak isteyen oyuncular ve performans sanatçıları.

What are Procurement and Sourcing?

Procurement: The overarching process of acquiring goods and services that a company needs for its operations. It goes beyond simply buying things; procurement covers:

  • Identifying needs

  • Finding suppliers

  • Negotiating contracts

  • Ordering

  • Receiving goods/services

  • Payment processing

  • Managing supplier relationships


Sourcing:  A strategic part of procurement. It focuses on:

  • Researching the market to find potential suppliers

  • Evaluating suppliers based on cost, quality, reliability, sustainability, and risk factors

  • Selecting the best suppliers for the business's specific needs


Why is Learning Procurement and Sourcing Important for Companies and Managers?

  • Cost Savings: Effective procurement and sourcing finds the best value for money. This directly impacts the company's bottom line.

  • Efficiency: Streamlined processes in procurement avoid delays and bottlenecks in a company's operations.

  • Risk Mitigation: Thorough sourcing helps identify potential risks (like supply disruptions) and proactively manage them.

  • Competitive Advantage: Strong supplier relationships and access to quality materials or services can give companies an edge in the market.

  • Innovation: Sourcing can help uncover new technologies, materials, or processes that boost a company's offerings.


How Procurement and Sourcing Skills Build Global Careers

  • High Demand: Companies worldwide of all sizes need individuals who understand how to source and procure effectively.

  • Transferable Skills: The fundamentals of procurement and sourcing apply across industries and countries.

  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Procurement interacts with many departments (finance, operations, legal), giving a broad view of how businesses function globally.

  • Growth Potential: As globalization increases, the need for professionals who understand the complexities of international procurement and supply chains will rise.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Procurement, Sourcing, Supply Chains

Business Development involves activities aimed at creating long-term value for an organization through forming strategic partnerships, identifying new business opportunities, and fostering growth. It encompasses a wide range of tasks including market research, networking, negotiation, and relationship building.


Sales and Marketing are two interconnected functions focused on promoting and selling products or services. Sales involves direct interactions with potential customers to close deals, while marketing encompasses activities such as advertising, branding, market analysis, and lead generation to attract and retain customers.


Learning Business Development, Sales & Marketing is crucial for companies and managers for several reasons:


Revenue Generation: Business Development, Sales, and Marketing are directly linked to revenue generation. A strong understanding of these areas enables companies to effectively identify, target, and convert leads into paying customers, thereby increasing sales and revenue.


Market Understanding: By learning about market trends, customer needs, and competitor analysis, companies can make informed decisions about product development, pricing strategies, and market positioning, ultimately gaining a competitive edge.


Strategic Partnerships: Business Development skills are essential for forging strategic partnerships and alliances with other businesses. These partnerships can lead to expanded market reach, access to new resources, and mutually beneficial collaborations.


Customer Satisfaction and Retention: Effective Sales and Marketing strategies not only attract new customers but also contribute to customer satisfaction and retention. Understanding customer preferences and delivering value-added solutions can lead to long-term customer relationships and repeat business.


Adaptability: Companies need to constantly adapt to changing market conditions and customer preferences. Learning Business Development, Sales & Marketing equips managers with the skills to innovate, pivot strategies, and stay ahead of the competition.


Improving skills in Business Development, Sales & Marketing is important for building a successful career or business because:


Entrepreneurial Success: For entrepreneurs and business owners, mastering these areas is crucial for launching and growing a successful venture. Effective Business Development, Sales & Marketing strategies are essential for attracting investors, acquiring customers, and achieving sustainable growth.


Career Advancement: In managerial roles, proficiency in Business Development, Sales & Marketing opens up opportunities for career advancement. Managers who can drive sales, expand market share, and build strategic partnerships are highly valued by organizations across industries.


Personal Branding: Regardless of one's career path, understanding these disciplines enhances personal branding and professional reputation. Individuals with strong Business Development, Sales & Marketing skills are seen as valuable assets who can drive business growth and deliver results.


Versatility: Proficiency in these areas provides individuals with versatility in the job market. Whether pursuing roles in sales management, marketing, business development, or entrepreneurship, the skills acquired are transferable across various industries and sectors.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career at business, or develop their own business or become an entrepreneur

courseDetails.title: Mental Toughness: Sports Psychology for Peak Performance
courseDetails.shortDescription: How Top Athletes and Coaches Use Psychology to Win. Overcome Blocks, Achieve Your Goals In Sport! Certification Course
courseDetails.longDescription:
Mastering the Mental Game: The Ultimate Course in Sport Psychology

Course Overview:

Unlock your athletic potential and rise to the top of your game with "Mastering the Mental Game: The Ultimate Course in Sport Psychology." This comprehensive course is designed for athletes, coaches, and sports enthusiasts who are eager to harness the power of the mind to achieve peak performance. From setting powerful goals to mastering mental toughness, this course covers every aspect of sport psychology to help you gain the winning edge.

What You’ll Learn:

  1. Train Your Brain for Victory: Exploring Sport Psychology

    • Lecture 1: Win from Within: Setting Powerful Goals That Ignite Athlete Performance (Preview Available) Discover the secrets of setting goals that not only inspire but also drive you to outperform your competition.

    • Lecture 2: Master Your Mind, Master Your Game: An Introduction to Sport Psychology Get a foundational understanding of sport psychology and how it can transform your athletic journey.

    • Lecture 3: Building Mental Muscle: Essential Psychological Concepts for Athletes Dive deep into the core psychological concepts crucial for athletic success.

    • Lecture 4: Level Up Your Mental Game: A Practical Guide to Core Sport Psychology Concepts Learn practical applications of sport psychology to elevate your performance.

    • Lecture 5: How Sport Psychology Started Revolutionizing Performance Explore the history and evolution of sport psychology and its impact on sports.


  2. Train Your Mind, Win the Game: Building Mental Toughness Like a Champion

    • Lecture 6: Conquer Challenges, Achieve Greatness: The Traits of Mentally Tough Athletes Understand the characteristics that define mentally tough athletes and how you can develop them.

    • Lecture 7: Building the Unbreakable You: The Code, The What, and Why of Mental Toughness Learn the key aspects and definitions of mental toughness.

    • Lecture 8: Strengthen Your Inner Strength: Start These Mental Toughness Exercises Today Begin practical exercises designed to boost your mental resilience.

    • Lecture 9: Train Your Brain for Resilience: Actionable Strategies to Build Mental Toughness Implement actionable strategies to enhance your mental toughness.


  3. From Good to Great: Key Areas, and How Sport Psychologists Help Athletes Thrive

    • Lecture 10: Master the Mental Game: Optimize Your Performance with Sport Psychology Understand how sport psychology can optimize your overall performance.

    • Lecture 11: The Mental Toolbox: Exploring the Key Areas of Sport Psychology Explore various key areas within sport psychology that are essential for athletes.

    • Lecture 12: Overcoming Adversity, Importance of Mental Toughness in Competition Learn how to overcome adversity and the role of mental toughness in competitive settings.


  4. Tools & Techniques for Stress Management, Conflict Resolution, Overcoming Setbacks

    • Lecture 13: Win-Win Solutions: Effective Conflict Resolution Techniques for Everyone Master effective conflict resolution techniques to maintain harmony and focus.

    • Lecture 14: From Stagnant to Soaring: How to Break Through Plateaus and Overcome Setbacks Discover strategies to break through performance plateaus and setbacks.

    • Lecture 15: Calm in the Chaos: Proven Stress Management Techniques for a More Peaceful Life Learn proven stress management techniques to stay calm under pressure.

    • Lecture 16: Beyond the Burnout: Secrets to Sustaining Motivation and Overcoming Setbacks Find out how to sustain motivation and overcome burnout.


  5. Fueling Champions: Sleep & Nutrition Hacks for Peak Performance

    • Lecture 17: The Winning Formula: Athlete's Guide to Nourishing Your Body, and Mind Get comprehensive guidance on how to nourish your body and mind for peak performance.

    • Lecture 18: Food for Champions: Unveiling Nutritional Strategies for Winning Games Learn nutritional strategies that can enhance your game.

    • Lecture 19: Train, Eat, Sleep, Repeat: Unleashing Athletic Potential Through Better Sleep Understand the crucial relationship between sleep and athletic performance.


  6. The Role of Mental Health and Psychology in Injury Recovery

    • Lecture 20: From Setback to Comeback: The Untold Story of Injury & Rehabilitation Psychology Explore the psychological aspects of injury and rehabilitation.

    • Lecture 21: The Hidden Healer: How Mental Health Boosts Injury Recovery and Fitness Discover how mental health significantly contributes to injury recovery.

    • Lecture 22: Game On Again: Take Control of Your Injury Recovery and Return to Play Learn strategies to take control of your recovery and return to play stronger.


  7. Build Your Team Spirit: The Sport Psych's Guide to Inspiring Leadership

    • Lecture 23: Lead Like a Legend: How To Develop Powerful Leadership Skills in Sports Develop leadership skills that inspire and guide your team to success.

    • Lecture 24: The Captain's and Coach Code: Mastering the Traits of Effective Sports Leaders Understand the traits that make for effective sports leaders.

    • Lecture 25: Improve Your Team Dynamics, Learn Communication, and Leadership Training Enhance team dynamics through improved communication and leadership training.


  8. A Sport Psychologist's Guide to Concentration, Focus, and Confidence

    • Lecture 26: Beyond Distraction: The Art of Focus in Sports Psychology Master techniques to improve your focus and concentration in sports.

    • Lecture 27: From Nervous to Fearless: Building Unbreakable Confidence to Win Matches Build unbreakable confidence to perform at your best under pressure.

    • Lecture 28: Train Your Brain and Mind for Victory: Design Your Pre-Competition Routine Design effective pre-competition routines and rituals for optimal performance.


  9. Unveiling The Mental Game of Greats: Lessons From Elite Athletes Using Psychology

    • Lecture 29-43: Case Studies Gain insights from the psychological strategies of elite athletes like Serena Williams, Hope Solo, Jurgen Klopp, Lionel Messi, Michael Phelps, Michael Jordan, Pep Guardiola, Phil Jackson, Naomi Osaka, Marcus Rashford, Simone Biles, Steve Kerr, Tiger Woods, Andreas Iniesta, and Cristiano Ronaldo. Learn how these champions use sport psychology to achieve greatness.


  10. Ultimate Guide to Sports Psychology: Q&A for Athletes and Coaches

    • Lecture 44: Questions and Answers Engage in an interactive Q&A session to clarify doubts and deepen your understanding of sport psychology.

Why Enroll?

  • Expert Instruction: Learn from experienced professionals in the field of sport psychology.

  • Comprehensive Content: Covering everything from goal setting and mental toughness to stress management and leadership.

  • Practical Strategies: Implement actionable strategies and exercises to enhance your mental game.

  • Real-Life Examples: Gain insights from case studies of elite athletes and their psychological techniques.

  • Interactive Learning: Benefit from an interactive Q&A session to address your specific questions and challenges.

Who Should Enroll?

  • Athletes at any level looking to improve their mental game

  • Coaches aiming to better support their athletes

  • Sports enthusiasts interested in understanding the psychological aspects of sports

  • Anyone interested in personal development and peak performance

Launch the secrets to mental mastery in sports and elevate your game. Enroll now in "Mastering the Mental Game: The Ultimate Course in Sport Psychology" and start your journey to becoming a champion from within!

Digital Transformation: Digital transformation refers to the integration of digital technology into all areas of a business, fundamentally changing how it operates and delivers value to customers. It involves leveraging digital technologies such as cloud computing, artificial intelligence, data analytics, Internet of Things (IoT), and others to streamline processes, enhance customer experiences, and drive innovation. Digital transformation isn't just about adopting new technologies; it's about reimagining business models and processes to stay competitive in the digital age.


Digital Business Development: Digital business development focuses on utilizing digital technologies and strategies to expand a company's reach, improve its products or services, and increase revenue streams. It involves activities such as digital marketing, e-commerce, online partnerships, and digital product innovation. Digital business development aims to capitalize on the opportunities presented by the digital landscape to grow the business and create new value for customers.


Importance for Companies and Managers:


Learning about digital transformation and digital business development is crucial for companies and managers for several reasons:


Staying Competitive: In today's rapidly evolving business environment, companies need to adapt to digital trends to stay competitive. Understanding digital transformation helps companies modernize their operations and keep pace with changing customer expectations.


Enhancing Efficiency: Digital technologies can streamline processes, automate tasks, and improve overall efficiency. Managers who understand digital transformation can identify areas where technology can be leveraged to optimize operations and reduce costs.


Expanding Reach: Digital business development opens up new avenues for reaching customers and expanding market reach. Managers equipped with knowledge of digital strategies can develop effective online marketing campaigns, explore new digital channels, and forge partnerships in the digital ecosystem.


Driving Innovation: Digital transformation fosters innovation by enabling companies to leverage data insights, experiment with new technologies, and iterate on products or services more rapidly. Managers who embrace digital transformation can foster a culture of innovation within their teams and drive continuous improvement.


Importance for Career Development or Building Your Own Business:


Improving skills in digital transformation and digital business development is crucial for building a successful career or starting your own business because:


Market Demand: Digital skills are in high demand across industries as companies seek to navigate digital disruption and capitalize on emerging opportunities. Having expertise in digital transformation and business development enhances your marketability and opens up career advancement opportunities.


Entrepreneurial Success: For aspiring entrepreneurs, understanding digital transformation and business development is essential for launching and scaling a successful business in today's digital-first world. It allows entrepreneurs to identify market gaps, develop innovative digital solutions, and effectively market their products or services online.


Adaptability: Digital technologies are continually evolving, so individuals who continuously improve their skills in digital transformation and business development remain adaptable to changing market dynamics. This adaptability is essential for long-term career growth and entrepreneurial success in a rapidly changing digital landscape.

What is the Real Estate Business?

The real estate business encompasses all activities related to the buying, selling, renting, development, and management of land and buildings. This includes:

  • Residential Real Estate: Homes, apartments, condominiums, and other housing types.

  • Commercial Real Estate: Office buildings, retail spaces, warehouses, industrial properties, hotels, and more.

  • Land: Undeveloped land, agricultural land, and properties with development potential.

  • Real Estate Brokerage: Facilitating transactions between buyers and sellers.

  • Real Estate Development: Transforming land into usable properties.

  • Property Management: Overseeing the operations of rental properties.


Why is Learning About the Real Estate Business Important for Companies and Managers?


Real estate knowledge has significant implications for businesses, regardless of their core industry:

  • Cost Management: Real estate is often a company's second-largest expense after personnel costs. Understanding lease negotiations, property values, and market trends is crucial for making informed financial decisions.

  • Business Expansion: When a company intends to grow, strategic real estate decisions play a vital role. Site selection, facility planning, and understanding local land-use regulations are essential for successfully scaling operations.

  • Asset Optimization: Companies often own more real estate than they need. Learning about sale-leaseback options or subleasing excess space can unlock hidden capital and improve a company's bottom line.

  • Workplace Strategy: The design and function of workplaces significantly affect employee productivity, well-being, and recruitment. Real estate knowledge informs optimal workplace strategies.

  • Investment Opportunities: For some larger corporations, investing in real estate can offer diversification and potential for additional revenue streams.


How Real Estate Skills Connect to Global Careers and Professional Services

Skills in the real estate field open doors to a wide range of fulfilling and lucrative global career opportunities:

  • International Real Estate Development: As companies expand globally, those with real estate development experience can contribute to planning and executing new facilities in foreign markets.

  • Global Site Selection: Professionals versed in real estate analysis can help multinational corporations identify the best locations for their operations, considering factors like demographics, infrastructure, and local regulations.

  • Cross-Border Transactions: Facilitating real estate sales and purchases across international borders requires navigating complex legal and financial systems.

  • Hospitality and Tourism: The global hospitality industry is heavily intertwined with real estate. Professionals who understand hotel development and management can have exciting international careers.

  • Consulting Services: Real estate consultants use their expertise to offer a range of services to corporations, investors, and governments worldwide.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Real Estate Business

Who is a Marketing Business Partner (MBP)?

The Marketing Business Partner acts as a vital bridge between the marketing department and specific business units or divisions within an organization. They work to deeply understand the needs and objectives of a particular business area, translating those needs into effective marketing strategies and campaigns.


Typical Functionality of an MBP

Strategic Alignment: MBPs ensure that marketing plans are tightly integrated with the business unit's goals, creating a cohesive push toward overall company objectives.

Market and Customer Insights: They gather and analyze market and customer data related to their business unit, tailoring marketing efforts for maximum impact.

Campaign Development and Execution: MBPs collaborate with marketing teams to design and implement marketing campaigns that resonate with the target audience of their business unit.

Performance Measurement: MBPs track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of marketing initiatives, providing data-driven insights for optimization.

Relationship Building: They cultivate strong relationships with stakeholders within their business units, promoting trust and collaboration.


Why is the MBP Role Important for Companies?

Enhanced Focus and Specificity: MBPs provide dedicated marketing expertise to specific business divisions, ensuring tailored solutions rather than generic marketing approaches.

Improved Communication and Coordination: They facilitate seamless communication between marketing teams and business units, breaking down silos and increasing efficiency.

Data-Driven Decision Making: Their focus on market analysis and performance tracking fosters better strategic decisions rooted in real results.

Increased ROI: Optimized marketing efforts targeted to specific business areas lead to higher returns on marketing investments.


Learning, Development, and Building a Career as an MBP

Essential skills to develop for  success as a Marketing Business Partner:

Strategic Thinking: The ability to link marketing activities with overarching business goals is vital.

Analytical Skills: Strong data analysis capabilities to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement.

Communication and Collaboration: Excellent interpersonal skills are crucial for building strong working relationships across teams and departments.

Project Management: MBPs need to organize and oversee complex marketing projects on time and within budget.

Business Acumen: A deep understanding of overall business operations, market dynamics, and industry trends.


Career Development Tips

Seek Cross-Functional Opportunities: Gain exposure to various aspects of marketing and business operations.

Network and Mentorship Connect with experienced professionals in the field. Seek out mentors for guidance.

Continuous Learning: Stay updated on marketing trends, best practices, and tools through industry publications, courses, or certifications.

Showcase Your Results: Document the impact of your marketing initiatives, demonstrating your value to potential employers or within your current organization.

What are Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A)?

  • Merger: Two companies of relatively similar size combine forces to create a new, single entity. This is often a move for market expansion or gaining a competitive edge.

  • Acquisition: One company purchases a majority stake or all of another company. The acquiring company gains control of the acquired company's assets and operations. This can be done to enter new markets, eliminate competition, or gain new technology resources.


Key Pitfalls in M&A

  • Culture Clash: Combining distinct company cultures can lead to employee conflicts, low morale, and a decline in productivity.

  • Overpaying: Enthusiasm can lead companies to overpay for an acquisition, resulting in financial losses down the line.

  • Poor Integration: Failure to smoothly integrate systems, processes, and teams creates operational chaos and hinders the potential of the combined entity.

  • Lack of Due Diligence: Insufficient research about the target company's financial health, legal standing, or market position might expose hidden liabilities and risks.

  • Loss of Focus: The complexity of the M&A process can distract from core business operations, leading to neglected customers or missed opportunities.


Why is Learning About M&A Important for Companies and Managers?

  • Strategic Growth: M&A can be a powerful tool to expand into new markets, acquire new technologies, eliminate competitors, or increase market share significantly.

  • Responding to Market Changes Companies must adapt to industry shifts. An M&A strategy can be vital for staying ahead of the competition or even surviving.

  • Leadership Development: M&A success relies heavily on the ability of managers to navigate complexity, integrate teams, and make crucial decisions under pressure.


How Can M&A Skills Support Career Development?

  • Increased Demand: As M&A activity continues to be prevalent, professionals with these skills are highly sought after by companies, investment banks, and consulting firms.

  • Leadership Opportunities: M&A skills signal strategic thinking, problem-solving abilities, and a talent for execution – all assets for leadership roles.

  • Broader Skillset: M&A involves exposure to various aspects of business such as finance, valuation, negotiation, and legal, thus developing a more versatile skillset.

  • Higher Compensation: M&A professionals often command higher salaries due to their specialized knowledge and in-demand skillsets.

courseDetails.title: Professional Diploma of Virtual Executive Assistant
courseDetails.shortDescription: Professional Diploma of Virtual Executive Assistant by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course Professional Diploma of Virtual Executive Assistant by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


The Role of a Virtual Executive Assistant

A Virtual Executive Assistant (VEA) acts as a remote, highly skilled administrative professional, providing support to executives, entrepreneurs, and high-level managers. Think of them as the traditional executive assistant, but one who works from anywhere in the world.


Typical Functionality of a VEA

  • Calendar Management: Scheduling meetings, organizing appointments, managing travel itineraries, and ensuring the executive's time is effectively used.

  • Email Management: Filtering, prioritizing, and responding to emails, drafting correspondence, and managing the executive's inbox.

  • Project Management: Tracking project deadlines, coordinating with team members, preparing reports, and aiding in overall project completion.

  • Travel Arrangements: Booking flights, hotels, and transportation while considering budgets and the executive's preferences.

  • Research: Conducting online research, compiling data, and preparing summaries or presentations to support decision-making.

  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM): Updating client information, managing contact lists, and assisting with sales or client-related follow-ups.

  • Additional Task Support: This can include event planning, social media management, data entry, and more, depending on the VEA's skillset and the executive's needs.


Learning, Development, and Building a Career as a VEA

  • Continuous development is key for VEAs. Here's how to enhance your skills and build a successful career:

  • Essential Skills Development: Focus on excellent communication (written and verbal), organizational skills, project management, problem-solving, and time management.

  • Software Proficiency: Become well-versed in productivity suites (Microsoft Office/Google Suite), email clients, communication platforms (Slack, Zoom, etc.), and project management tools (Trello, Asana, etc.).

  • Specialization: Develop expertise in specific areas like bookkeeping, social media management, or a particular industry. This will make you more valuable.

  • Networking: Connect with other VEAs, join online communities, and attend relevant conferences to broaden your professional network.

  • Mentorship: Seek guidance from experienced VEAs or consider formal training programs to accelerate your development.


Benefits of Fully Remote Work as a VEA

  • Flexibility: You set your own hours (with consideration for the executive's needs) and create a work-life balance that suits you.

  • Location Independence: Work from anywhere in the world, allowing for freedom to travel or choose a living situation that fits your preferences.

  • Cost Savings: Reduce commuting costs and gain the ability to live in areas with a lower cost of living.

  • Increased Productivity: Many individuals find a greater level of focus and productivity working from home.

  • Entrepreneurial Opportunities: Experienced VEAs often start their own businesses offering VEA services, providing greater earning potential and control.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in executive assistance and office management

courseDetails.title: American English Vowels & Placement for All
courseDetails.shortDescription: Pronunciation and American Accent Training  for English Language Learners from All Language Backgrounds
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you want to know everything about vowels and won't settle for just an overview, then this course is for you.  If you've taken other courses and still don't feel confident with your pronunciation, then this course is for you.    It is dense with  detail about every vowel, so you may have to watch certain parts more than once to make sure you've got it.    Example sentences are from every day life as well as high tech or business fields, so you will be exposed to a variety of vocabulary.  The course includes repetition audio practice so you can repeat the sentences over and over again to develop muscle memory.  This course has lessons for learners from various language backgrounds.  It will be beneficial for Chinese, Indian, Vietnamese, Japanese, Spanish, French, German, Russian, Persian speakers and more.  The instructor has free office hours on Zoom once a month, so you are invited to meet her for questions and to have her check your pronunciation and whether you are incorporating the information properly.

What you'll learn


  • Adjust your voice to sound more like a native speaker of American English.

  • Place your voice and resonance in the correct parts of your vocal tract.

  • Exercise the muscles needed for an American accent.

  • Make each vowel clearly and articulate clearly.

  • Produce and distinguish between all the English vowels at the beginning, middle or end of a word.

  • Speak from a detailed theoretical understanding of the vowels.

  • Understand different spelling patterns for each vowel sound.

  • Identify and avoid common pitfalls for each vowel sound.

  • Connect vowels to other vowels and consonants.

  • Expand your vocabulary through high tech and professional examples.

  • And much more!

Requirements

  • A computer with internet connection is all you need.

  • You should be willing to practice several minutes a day

  • You do NOT need any knowledge or experience of pronunciation techniques.

  • Ask me ANY questions by messaging me. I'm here to help you at any time.

Description

You can speak American English clearly and sound like a native English speaker.

I will show you step by step how to strengthen your tongue, jaw, and lips, and how to use your diaphragm and throat and breathe right.  We will get your tongue moving the way an American moves his/her tongue.   You will stop confusing bitch with beach and board with bird.  We will go through all the different types of vowels and learn how they're related and different.  We will  practice each vowel in sentences, and you can keep practicing the sentences till they feel natural with the repetition audio recordings included.   You will learn skills and knowledge that will benefit you for the rest of your life. 

Who this course is for:


  • Beginner who want to learn without any bad habits right from the beginning.

  • Intermediate students who have started to learn pronunciation the wrong way

  • Advanced Students who want to challenge themselves with nuanced detail and high tech vocabulary

When to take this course:

Get started before you feel ready! There will never be a perfect time to start something.  There is no better time than now! You have a lot to learn!  See you in class :)

courseDetails.title: Hacking Etico a Redes WiFi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a como los Hackers realizan ataques en redes informáticas. Aprende Ciberseguridad y Hacking Etico
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bienvenidos al Curso de Hacking Ético a Redes WiFi

Este curso está diseñado para aquellos interesados en aprender técnicas de Hacking Ético hacia redes WiFi.

El curso está basado en la herramienta Kali Linux, que es una distribución de Linux utilizada por expertos en seguridad informática para realizar pruebas de penetración (pentesting) en sistemas y redes. Los estudiantes aprenderán a utilizar Kali Linux y sus herramientas de Hacking Ético para identificar y explotar vulnerabilidades en sistemas operativos, aplicaciones y redes.

En el curso veremos técnicas de Hacking Ético como Phishing, que son utilizadas para obtener información sensible como contraseñas y credenciales de acceso. Los estudiantes también aprenderán sobre Hacking a Windows, que se enfoca en explotar vulnerabilidades específicas en sistemas operativos Windows para obtener acceso a estos sistemas.

Veremos técnicas de Hacking Ético como Ataques DOS (Denial of Service), que son ataques maliciosos que buscan bloquear el acceso a un sitio web o red, así como en Ataque MITM (Man-In-The-Middle), que es un tipo de ataque en el que el atacante intercepta la comunicación entre dos sistemas para obtener información confidencial.

El curso también cubre Cracking y Hacking Ético a redes WiFi, donde los estudiantes aprenderán a descifrar contraseñas de redes inalámbricas protegidas, y cómo proteger su propia red WiFi contra ataques externos. veremos el uso de Nmap, una herramienta de escaneo de puertos y detección de servicios utilizada en el Hacking para el analisis red.

Los estudiantes podrán aplicar lo aprendido en el curso a través de prácticas en sistemas vulnerables.

En resumen, este curso ofrece una formación en técnicas de Hacking Ético y Ciberseguridad aplicado a redes WiFi, cubriremos los ataques que se pueden realizar en red.

Al final del curso, los estudiantes estarán capacitados con las habilidades y conocimientos necesarios para proteger sus redes y sistemas de los ataques.

Aprende como te atacan, para aprender a como defenderte.

Espero que aprendas Hacking Etico y Ciberseguridad con este curso.

Nos vemos!

Tu profesor: Thiago Araujo

Aviso: Todo el contenido que se muestre en este curso y sea utilizado para el mal, no me responsabiliza.
